Introduction
This topic contains information on the process for identifying incarcerated beneficiaries and dependents, including
SSA and BOP agreements with VA
how VA processes the data it receives from SSA and BOP
individuals that data matching identifies
responsibility for processing cases involving beneficiaries in receipt of pension or Dependency and Indemnity Compensation (DIC)
, and
Central Office point of contact
.
title: M21-1, Part XIV, Chapter 7 - Data-Matching Programs That Identify Incarcerated Beneficiaries and Dependents
